headline: Tell HN: Google is not responding for My Business account reinstatement requests
description: I've tried to reach Google to reinstate my google business listing profile after the incident https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31777650 but for some reason they blocked my account and I can't even create a new account. Anyone had the issues before?
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：谷歌不回应我的企业账户恢复请求
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：谷歌不回應我的企業賬戶恢復請求
description_zh-Hans: 事件发生后，我曾试图联系谷歌恢复我的谷歌商业列表资料，https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31777650，但由于某些原因，他们封锁了我的账户，我甚至无法创建一个新账户。有谁以前遇到过这种问题？
description_zh-Hant: 事件發生後，我曾試圖聯繫谷歌恢復我的谷歌商業列表資料，https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31777650，但由於某些原因，他們封鎖了我的賬戶，我甚至無法創建一個新賬戶。有誰以前遇到過這種問題？
